mapper.select: SELECT m.id, m.user_id, m.content, m.images, m.like_count, m.comment_count, m.share_count, m.topics, m.create_time, m.update_time, m.deleted, u.nickname, u.avatar FROM moment m LEFT JOIN user u ON m.user_id = u.id WHERE m.deleted = 0 ORDER BY m.create_time DESC
SELECT user_id FROM moment_like WHERE moment_id = #{momentId} AND deleted = 0
